name: NextCloud
overview: NextCloud was founded with a mission to deliver cloud computing with a difference, solutions that provide high performance, secure operation and truly enterprise class scalability. Their company headquarters and primary datacenter is located in seismically neutral Sacramento, California, offering a world class N+1 redundant infrastructure and 24 x 7 hands on customer service. NextCloud has access to the finest fiber optic network infrastructure enabling low latency connectivity to facilities throughout the US and the ability to connect to a wide range of telecommunications service providers to ensure you can achieve the required high speed connectivity to deliver true Enterprise Cloud Solutions. They actively encourage their customers to visit their datacenters and understand how their critical computing, storage and networking requirements are met both today and into the future.

funding_rounds.source_description: NextCloud Inc. moves to Connecticut, raises $1.2M
